title: The Runaways -  Joan Jett - Lita Ford - Discography - 320 kbps
description:
The Runaways -  Joan Jett - Lita Ford - Discography - 320 kbps

The Runaways were an American all-female rock band that recorded and performed in the second half of the 1970s. The band released four studio albums and one live set during its run. Among its best-known songs: "Cherry Bomb", "Queens of Noise", "Neon Angels On the Road to Ruin", "California Paradise", "Dead End Justice", and the cover of The Velvet UndergroundÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s "Rock n Roll". The Runaways, though never a major success in the United States, became a sensation in 1977 in Japan thanks to the hit single "Cherry Bomb"
